import { useState } from 'react' import { useLocation, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import '../Admin.css' import axios from 'axios' function UpdateUsers() { const [inputs, setInputs] = useState({ lastname: "", firstname: "", email: "", password: "", dateOfBirth: "", address: "", role: "" }) const [err, setErr] = useState(false) const navigate = useNavigate() const location = useLocation() const userId = location.pathname.split("/")[3] const handleChange = e => { setInputs(prev => ({...prev, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}) ) } const handleClick = async e => { try{ await axios.put("http://localhost:4000/users/updateuser/" + userId, inputs) navigate("/admin") } catch(err){ setErr(err) } console.log(err) } return (

Modification de l'utilisateur {inputs.idusers}

) } export default UpdateUsers
